1.0.name: wordpress/network-latest-posts
1.0.description:
This plugin pull the recent posts from all the blogs in your network and displays them in your main site (or any internal site) using shortcodes or widgets. For further details please visit: http://en.8elite.com/network-latest-posts [English] http://es.8elite.com/network-latest-posts [Espanol] http://fr.8elite.com/network-latest-posts [Francais].

This plugin works with Wordpress 3 Network (multisites) Looking for single install versions? http://single-latest-posts.laelitenetwork.com
